body_html:
You can import the classifier the way in the examples like:

from tensorflow.contrib.boosted_trees.estimator_batch.estimator import GradientBoostedDecisionTreeRegressor

But I'm asking the team about whether there's any reason of being made not accessible directly.
body_text:
You can import the classifier the way in the examples like:
from tensorflow.contrib.boosted_trees.estimator_batch.estimator import GradientBoostedDecisionTreeRegressor
But I'm asking the team about whether there's any reason of being made not accessible directly.
body:
You can import the classifier the way in the [examples](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/boosted_trees/examples/boston.py#L42) like:

`from tensorflow.contrib.boosted_trees.estimator_batch.estimator import GradientBoostedDecisionTreeRegressor`

But I'm asking the team about whether there's any reason of being made not accessible directly.
